body_html: Hello @acnagy et al. Just wanted to check on the status of this one. It already adds so much good stuff, can we maybe descope the All The Things to 85% Of The Things ? 😉 … and bring it to a mergeable state? Is there anything one can help you with?
body_text: Hello @acnagy et al. Just wanted to check on the status of this one. It already adds so much good stuff, can we maybe descope the All The Things to 85% Of The Things ? 😉 … and bring it to a mergeable state? Is there anything one can help you with?
body: Hello @acnagy et al. Just wanted to check on the status of this one. It already adds so much good stuff, can we maybe descope the _All The Things_ to _85% Of The Things_ ? 😉 … and bring it to a mergeable state? Is there anything one can help you with?
